栽.definition: to plant; to grow; to insert; to erect (e.g. a bus stop sign); to impose sth on sb; to stumble; to fall down

栽培.definition: to grow; to cultivate; to train; to educate; to patronize

栽筋斗.definition: to tumble; to fall head over heels; (fig.) to take a tumble

栽贓.definition: to frame sb (by planting sth on them)

栽跟頭.definition: to fall head over heels; (fig.) to come a cropper
